A couple of cool ideas for the WBC 50 Hikes Challenge.

### 1. Apple Guides (First concept for WBC 50)

From the Apple support page on how to use Guides:

> *Explore new places with Guides in Maps on iPhone.  Guides from trusted brands and partners are available in the Maps app*

> *In the Maps app <img src="https://help.apple.com/assets/5FD260DB680CE26D5580207C/5FD260DF680CE26D558020B0/en_US/089762aa58157ec3e9bdd4e42a6c3424.png" alt="" height="30" width="29" originalimagename="GlobalArt/IL_Maps.png">, you can organize places into your own guides.  Add a place to your Guides on your iPhone: Tap “Save to,” then choose one of your guides.*

* Works great to validate.  Doesn't have to be the final map, but it gets us 95% of the way there
* [Apple Guides](https://guides.apple.com/?ug=ChxOQ0cgNTAgZm9yIDUwIEhpa2UgQ2hhbGxlbmdlEg4IwjsQ8I6Fnr32rqmaARJhGkVNYXJpbmUgQ29ycHMgQmFzZSBDYW1wIFBlbmRsZXRvbiwgRmFsbGJyb29rLCBDQSAgOTIwMjgsIFVuaXRlZCBTdGF0ZXMiEglu9fwNDaVAQBFNjEHKkFRdwCoEYWFhMRJhGjQxODM5MCBSZWF0YSBXYXksIFNhbiBEaWVnbywgQ0EgIDkyMTI4LCBVbml0ZWQgU3RhdGVzIhIJ%2FB7havCFQEARLHO1%2FTtEXcAqFUJhdHRsZSBNb3VudGFpbiBUcmFpbBJjGjpMYWtlIEhvZGdlcyBCaWtlIFBhdGgsIEVzY29uZGlkbywgQ0EgIDkyMDI1LCBVbml0ZWQgU3RhdGVzIhIJWhran3uIQEAR3paD%2Bl1EXcAqEUJlcm5hcmRvIE1vdW50YWluEmQaQFNhbnRhIFlzYWJlbCBUcnVjayBUcmFpbCwgU2FudGEgWXNhYmVsLCBDQSAgOTIwNzAsIFVuaXRlZCBTdGF0ZXMiEglGlvS64o9AQBHYWeL9UjNdwCoMQmxhY2sgQ2FueW9uEnMaPEJsdWUgU2t5IEVjb2xvZ2ljYWwgUmVzZXJ2ZSwgUG93YXksIENBICA5MjA2NCwgVW5pdGVkIFN0YXRlcyISCTz%%2FY9AQBHkR5MWbUtdwCoRRG91YmxlIFBlYWsgVHJhaWwSDQiuTRDLkq3H7M7Pmj8SDgiuTRCet5niuo%2Fq9IMBEmQaPE1vdW50IFdvb2Rzb24gQ291bnRyeSBDbHViLCBSYW1vbmEsIENBICA5MjA2NSwgVW5pdGVkIFN0YXRlcyISCXv18dB3gUBAEbg%2FFw0ZPV3AKhBGcnkgS29lZ2VsIFRyYWlsEmoaPTQwMDPigJM0MDk5IEhlbGxlcnMgQmVuZCwgRmFsbGJyb29rLCBDQSAgOTIwMjgsIFVuaXRlZCBTdGF0ZXMiEgmO8OXQVahAQBG4zorK%2B05dwCoVSGVsbGVycyBCZW5kIFByZXNlcnZlEg4Irk0QjLqfouPXwY7jARJeGjtJbmFqYSBNZW1vcmlhbCBQYXJrLCBTYW50YSBZc2FiZWwsIENBICA5MjA3MCwgVW5pdGVkIFN0YXRlcyISCYj1qYGYjEBAEWiAHWmNKl3AKgtJbmFqYSBUcmFpbBINCK5NEJyb%2BN%2B63d6PWxJrGjoxOTMxMeKAkzE5MzI3IExha2UgRHIsIEVzY29uZGlkbywgQ0EgIDkyMDI5LCBVbml0ZWQgU3RhdGVzIhIJ%%%2F%2Bp96H%2F%2BIBEmwaODIwMjUwIFF1ZXN0aGF2ZW4gUmQsIEVzY29uZGlkbywgQ0EgIDkyMDI5LCBVbml0ZWQgU3RhdGVzIhIJMmB2KTmKQEARltqk%2FJpKXcAqHFF1ZXN0aGF2ZW4gUm9hZCBOYXR1cmUgVHJhaWwSDQiuTRCAgPOTuqj33RQSDgiuTRD2uKuosOnf8pUBEg0Irk0QvtKj4rrd%2FuUyEg4Irk0Qs4bW2MmyqvOnARJ4GjsyMjI1OeKAkzIyOTMzIENBLTc5LCBTYW50YSBZc2FiZWwsIENBICA5MjA3MCwgVW5pdGVkIFN0YXRlcyISCZzNiWY%2FkEBAEUpWEj5tK13AKiVTYW50YSBZc2FiZWwgT3BlbiBTcGFjZSBQcmVzZXJ2ZSBFYXN0Eg0Irk0Q7eTph9Pv3q0dEnEaQTE2MjM34oCTMTYyNDEgU3ljYW1vcmUgQ2FueW9uIFJkLCBQb3dheSwgQ0EgIDkyMDY0LCBVbml0ZWQgU3RhdGVzIhIJWK%2BN2214QEAR%2Bo6O8sE%2BXcAqGFN5Y2Ftb3JlIENhbnlvbiBQcmVzZXJ2ZRJWGi5Ud2luIFBlYWtzIFJkLCBQb3dheSwgQ0EgI
